object.name: setChatMenuButton
object.description: Use this method to change the bot's menu button in a private chat, or the default menu button. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to change the bot's menu button in a private chat, or the default menu button. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to change the bot's menu button in a private chat, or the default menu button. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target private chat. If not specified, default bot's menu button will be changed
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target private chat. If not specified, default bot's menu button will be changed
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target private chat. If not specified, default bot's menu button will be changed
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for the bot's new menu button. Defaults to MenuButtonDefault
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for the bot's new menu button. Defaults to MenuButtonDefault
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for the bot's new menu button. Defaults to :class:`aiogram.types.menu_button_default.MenuButtonDefault`
annotations.name: menu_button
